W11_EVAR_MIDO_AREA_IN_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_MIDO_AREA_IN_DETAIL.text: You found a world teeming with vegetation and water on the other side of the door. There must be spirits here.

W11_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head back to the Heavens and search for the next spirit.

W11_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Time to head back to the Heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.

W11_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_999_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W11_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_999_DETAIL.text: You can leave Kamala through here.
